1095550.name: Pumpkin Dog Islands
1095550.description:
Pumpkin Dog Islands
About the Game
Pumpkin Dog Islands is a 3D Platformer, the player can Run, jump and hover, even wall jump against walls, and blast there way to the goal.
Pumpkin Dog Islands is filled with giant Enemies and Bosses.
Big 3D levels filled with collectibles and obstacles, Retro low poly inspired character designs.

Retro inspired soundtrack, low poly 3D environments, inspired by Early 3d platformers of the 90’s and 00’s.

-Genre, 3D Platformer
-Boss Battles
-Low poly 3D environment
1095550.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
